actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority contained in the message of the President of March 17, 1981 (H. Doc. 97-32), transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Rescinds, pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974, budget authority contained in the message of the President of March 17, 1981 (H. Doc. 97-32) for the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases of the National Institutes of Health of the Department of Health and Human Services.

titles.title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority contained in the message of the President of March 17, 1981 (H. Doc. 97-32), transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
